explains: vt. 减轻；使缓和；使平静

sentences.en: He did what he could to allay his wife's myriad fears.
sentences.cn: 他尽其所能来消除他妻子的各种恐惧。

sentences.en: But it will not allay the sense of unease.
sentences.cn: 但却无法减轻人们的不安情绪。

sentences.en: TenneT's pylons should help allay that fear.
sentences.cn: 滕特公司设计的线塔应该有助于减轻这些恐惧感。
